name: Alex Johnson
description: Creative graphic designer who finds unique ways to see the world. I love working on art projects and helping others see through new perspectives.

name: Samantha Lee
description: Software engineer with a focus on backend systems. I enjoy coding and find peace in solving logical puzzles.

name: Michael Chen
description: Entrepreneur and small business owner. I specialize in public speaking and building communities for local growth.

name: Rachel Green
description: Aspiring researcher in environmental science with a keen eye for detail. Passionate about preserving our natural resources.

name: David Kim
description: High school teacher who thrives on engaging students through innovative learning techniques. Big advocate for neurodiversity.

name: Priya Sharma
description: Freelance writer and editor focusing on storytelling and advocacy for neurodivergent voices. Enjoy long walks and coffee chats.

name: Oliver Smith
description: Full-time student majoring in psychology. My goal is to help others like me better understand their neurodivergence.

name: Nora Martinez
description: Therapist and mental health advocate. I provide counseling services and support groups for neurodivergent individuals.

name: Emily Thompson
description: Illustrator and visual artist focusing on comic storytelling. I use visuals to express thoughts I can't put into words.

name: Liam O'Connor
description: Part-time barista and volunteer at community gardens. I find joy in working with plants and learning about their role in our ecosystem.
